django.contrib.auth.tokens
==========================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.auth.tokens


Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.auth.tokens.default_token_generator


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.auth.tokens.PasswordResetTokenGenerator


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: PasswordResetTokenGenerator

   Strategy object used to generate and check tokens for the password
   reset mechanism.


   .. py:attribute:: key_salt
      :value: 'django.contrib.auth.tokens.PasswordResetTokenGenerator'



   .. py:attribute:: algorithm
      :value: None



   .. py:attribute:: secret


   .. py:attribute:: secret_fallbacks


   .. py:method:: make_token(user)

      Return a token that can be used once to do a password reset
      for the given user.



   .. py:method:: check_token(user, token)

      Check that a password reset token is correct for a given user.



.. py:data:: default_token_generator
